One order is for 6 pom poms

All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

Splaying from all the sides, our gorgeously flared pom poms are absolutely fab! Dangling magically from your ceilings, tree branches, or fixtures, these fluffy pom poms seem to float enchantingly in midair. These paper pom poms are an amazing embellishment to every occasion. From rehearsal dinners to weddings, showers to Halloween and Christmas Parties, or even birthday bashes, these vibrant hanging puffs provide a cheery and whimsical way to add more color and verve to any party venue. Hang them up a ceiling or a tree, bundle them high into corners, place around a candle holder, make into a centerpiece atop a centerpiece holder, or snip away for a paper project-whatever your urges, fancies, and out-of-the-box plans are, use these fanciful pom poms to impart a fluffier, softer, and dreamlike look to them!

Additional Information:

entry.title: Deluxe Marabou Ostrich Feather Boa - LIght Coral-2 Yards
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3500
Type: Dress
Price: 2.19

[About]

Material: Ostrich Feather
Size: 2yards long
1pc/order
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Make a dramatic statement with our stunning feather boas made from premium ostrich feathers. Because of their inherent beauty and natural flowing quality, Ostrich feathers are used in making upscale standard boas. They are soft, lush, and so very glamorous! Add an ethereal touch to your costumes with our comely ostrich feather boas that reflect high class and a swish charm. Our silky soft feather boas are perfect for drags, twirls, and coverage. Highly recommended and sough after in the theater industry, these boas add a trendy feminine touch to any look.

Ostrich Feather boas are great accents that can be worn with special evening dresses, Halloween costumes, carnival and dance costumes like burlesque dance, ballroom dance, proms etc. Drape it around a bride to be at a bachelorette party or use in Arts and Crafts and Holiday decorations like Valentines Day, Christmas, Easter, Halloween, Mardi Gras, Thanksgiving, Quinceanera, and more. These boas enhance the charismatic appeal of your costumes, enchanting the spectators with their lush and fluff manifold! Make a style statement by swathing this luxurious piece around yourself, leaving all the beholders swoon over at your Divalicious allure!

Additional Information:

  • Material: Ostrich Feather
  • Size: 2yards long
  • 1pc/order

  • Steps to Clean the Feathers:

    • Fill the bucket or tub with warm water.
    • Add a small amount of Woolite and agitate the water to mix.
    • Swish the feathers around the water. Do NOT scrub the feather as this will damage them.
    • Rinse by swishing in clean water.
    • Reshape the feathers.
    • Dry with a blow dryer on a low setting.

[Information]

Dahlia Flower Stem

Transform your home, office, or event space into a lush blossoming spring garden with our stunning line of lifelike faux flowers. Delicate silk texture coupled with realistic flower construction give these Silk Dahlia Flowers a lovely genuine look. Soft to the touch and stunning to the look, our artificial Dahlia blooms will spread floral flair and a cheerful air all around.

Silk Flower Spray

Intricately handcrafted by our master artisans with special attention to petal details, these silk artificial Dahlia flowers will make a wonderful floral accent to beautifully accentuate your home interior, wedding centerpieces, flower arrangements, bridal bouquets, corsages, and posies. Make fascinating bouquets to brighten up your ambiance, add to your floral arrangements for a pop of color and texture, or give your party chairs a fresh festive feel with these blooms.

Real Touch Flowers

Unlike fresh flowers, these artificial silk flowers will not wilt or wither; neither will they require any care and maintenance. Lush green silk leaves are beautifully adorned with delicate silk Dahlia blooms in the most realistic manner. Exuding blossomy charm all around, our faux flowers will stay fresh and festive, giving your ambiance an everlasting spring sensation.

 

Additional Information:

    Add a touch of class and sparkle in your decorations, favor boxes, cake servers etc. with these shimmery pull string bow ribbons. So simple to use and so shiny on your decor! Simply pull the string to form a magical bow. These lovely pull string bows are perfect to adorn all kinds of decorations, favor bags and boxes, gift wrapping and any other piece of celebration. These bows are constructed of a solid color border and a lustrous center. Just clip off 2 yards of a pull-string ribbon bow, pull the thread in the center and a perfect bow will instantly pop out!

    Additional Information:

    • Qty: 1 Spool
    • Material: Organza
    • Color: Orange
    • Length: 50 Yards | 150 ft.
    • Width: 1/8”
    • How to use: Simply pull to make a bow. The longer the pull ribbon used, the fuller the bow will be.
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Birthday, Events, Gift, Favors, DIY, Decoration
